cleaned_text: Dr. Tauqeer Ahmad, MD, FAAFP Family Practitioner499 Lisk 10303 [Show map](#) About Dr. Tauqeer Ahmad is a family practitioner practicing in Staten Island, NY. Dr. Ahmad specializes in comprehensive health care for people of all ages. In addition to diagnosing and treating illnesses, family practitioners also put focus on preventative care with routine checkups, tests and personalized coaching on how to maintain a healthy lifestyle. Dr. Ahmad possesses immense general knowledge on maintaining health and today, family practitioners provide more care for the underserved and rural populations than any other medical specialty.
